docs.lead_paragraph: Long Island elected officials from four levels of government met recently at the office of The New York Times in Garden City to discuss the effect of coming changes on the region. The participants were Representative Rick Lazio of Brightwaters and Assemblyman Michael A. L. Balboni of Mineola, both Republicans; Suffolk County Legislator Nora Bredes of Stony Brook and Supervisor Bruce Nyman of Long Beach, both Democrats.

headline.main: Assessing Effects of Impending Cuts in Government Services
